use_case: Complete business automation for dentist businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Dentist business owners, healthcare & medical professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for dentist businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the dentist industry.
key_benefits: Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Dentist businesses wanting to automate operations
New dentist businesses needing a complete system
Established healthcare & medical companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Dentist Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Dentist Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
